item.title: Ipfs
item.description: IPFS or InterPlanetary File System is a distributed file system that can be used for hosting videos for a video marker. It has the advantage of being pretty straight forward to use and requires very little setup. IPFS works by you running a node on your machine, and upload files to that node. If someone else tries to access it, their node will first figure out who has the file and then contact that node and download it, temporarily storing it on their local node.
